Package org.blockchainnative.convert

Class TypeConverters

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractSet<E>
        • java.util.HashSet<TypeConverter<?,?>>
          • org.blockchainnative.convert.TypeConverters
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<TypeConverter<?,?>>, java.util.Collection<TypeConverter<?,?>>, java.util.Set<TypeConverter<?,?>>
    public class TypeConverters
extends java.util.HashSet<TypeConverter<?,?>>
    Represents a colleciton of TypeConverter with additional lookup logic.

    Due to Java's implementation of generic types, each TypeConverter in the collection needs to bind the type parameters TTo and TFrom to a concrete type in order for the lookup functions to work properly.
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getTypeConverter

        public <TFrom,TTo> java.util.Optional<TypeConverter<TFrom,TTo>> getTypeConverter​(java.lang.reflect.Type fromType,
                                                                                 java.lang.reflect.Type toType)
        Tries to find a type converter whose type parameters match the given types.
        Type Parameters:
        TFrom - type parameter representing fromType
        TTo - type parameter representing toType
        Parameters:
        fromType - type to match with a type converter's type parameter TFrom
        toType - type to match with a type converter's type parameter TTo
        Returns:
        type Optional containing a converter that is able to convert objects from type fromType to type toType or empty Optional

      • getTypeConverter

        public TypeConverter<?,?> getTypeConverter​(java.lang.Class<? extends TypeConverter<?,?>> converterType)
        Returns an instance of the given TypeConverter class.

        If no instance of the given type is registered, a new instace will be created using class' default constructor.
        Parameters:
        converterType - class of the converter to be found.
        Returns:
        an instance of the given TypeConverter class
        Throws:
        TypeConvertException - If no instance of the given type is registered, and the given class does not define a parameterless constructor.

      • getConversionFunction

        public <TFrom,TTo> java.util.Optional<java.util.function.Function<TFrom,TTo>> getConversionFunction​(java.lang.reflect.Type fromType,
                                                                                                    java.lang.reflect.Type toType)
        Returns a Function targeting a TypeConverter's to() or from() function, depending on the given types.
        Type Parameters:
        TFrom - type parameter representing fromType
        TTo - type parameter representing toType
        Parameters:
        fromType - type to match with a type converter's type parameter TFrom
        toType - type to match with a type converter's type parameter TTo
        Returns:
        Function to convert from fromType to toType.

      • convertObjectUsingTypeConverterClass

        public java.lang.Object convertObjectUsingTypeConverterClass​(TypedObjectHolder objectHolder,
                                                             java.lang.Class<? extends TypeConverter<?,?>> typeConverterClass)
        Converts the object contained in the given TypedObjectHolder using the given type converter class.
        Parameters:
        objectHolder - object to be converted together with its type information
        typeConverterClass - type converter class to be used to convert the object
        Returns:
        the converted object
        Throws:
        TypeConvertException - in case an error occurs during type conversion or if the given type converter is not able to convert the object contained in objectHolder

      • convertObjectUsingTypeConverterClass

        public java.lang.Object convertObjectUsingTypeConverterClass​(TypedObjectHolder objectHolder,
                                                             java.lang.Class<? extends TypeConverter<?,?>> typeConverterClass,
                                                             boolean throwOnInvalidConverter)
        Converts the object contained in the given TypedObjectHolder using the given type converter class.
        Parameters:
        objectHolder - object to be converted together with its type information
        typeConverterClass - type converter class to be used to convert the object
        throwOnInvalidConverter - indicates whether or not the method shall throw an exception if the given type converter is not able to convert the object contained in objectHolder
        Returns:
        the converted object or null if the given type converter is not able to convert the object contained in objectHolder and throwOnInvalidConverter is set to false
        Throws:
        TypeConvertException - in case an error occurs during type conversion or if the given type converter is not able to convert the object contained in objectHolder and throwOnInvalidConverter is set to false

      • convertObjectUsingMatchingTypeConverter

        public java.lang.Object convertObjectUsingMatchingTypeConverter​(TypedObjectHolder objectHolder,
                                                                java.lang.reflect.Type targetType)
        Converts the object contained in the given TypedObjectHolder to the given target type using any matching type converter.
        Parameters:
        objectHolder - object to be converted together with its type information
        targetType - type to which the given object shall be converted
        Returns:
        the converted object
        Throws:
        TypeConvertException - in case an error occurs during type conversion or if no type converter is found that is able to convert the object contained in objectHolder.

      • convertObjectUsingMatchingTypeConverter

        public java.lang.Object convertObjectUsingMatchingTypeConverter​(TypedObjectHolder objectHolder,
                                                                java.lang.reflect.Type targetType,
                                                                boolean throwOnMissingConverter)
        Converts the object contained in the given TypedObjectHolder to the given target type using any matching type converter.
        Parameters:
        objectHolder - object to be converted together with its type information
        targetType - type to which the given object shall be converted
        throwOnMissingConverter - indicates whether or not the method shall throw an exception if no type converter is found that is able to convert the object contained in objectHolder
        Returns:
        the converted object or null if no type converter is found that is able to convert the object contained in objectHolder and throwOnMissingConverter is set to false
        Throws:
        TypeConvertException - in case an error occurs during type conversion or if no type converter is found that is able to convert the object contained in objectHolder and throwOnMissingConverter is set to false.
